Load Data Module¶

Data loading utilities for PAC4 - Student Performance in Catalonia.

This module provides helpers to load the official PAC4 datasets either by passing an explicit path or by interactively selecting one of the known files bundled under the project data/ folder.

src.modules.load_data.load_dataset(filepath=None)¶

Load a dataset from Excel.

Loads one of the PAC4 datasets from an Excel file. If filepath is not provided, an interactive prompt lets you choose between the performance and dropout datasets located under the project data/ directory.

Parameters:

filepath (Optional[str]) – Absolute or relative path to the Excel dataset. If None, the user is prompted to select a known dataset.

Return type:

DataFrame

Returns:

A pandas DataFrame with the loaded dataset.

Raises:

  • FileNotFoundError – If the resolved path does not exist.

  • ValueError – If an invalid selection is made during the prompt.

  • xlrd.XLRDError, openpyxl.utils.exceptions.InvalidFileException – If the Excel file is invalid or cannot be parsed by the engine.
